en_text: For 3 turns, recover 30% of max HP; Reduce binds and awoken skill binds by 4 turns

jp_skill.name: わしらは快賊ぜよ
jp_skill.raw_description: 3ターンの間、最大HP30％分回復。 バインド状態と覚醒無効状態を4ターン回復。

kr_skill.name: I'm a pleasure pirate
kr_skill.raw_description: Recovers 30% of max HP for 3 turns; reduces bind status (incl. Awoken) by 4 turns

na_skill.name: I'm a pleasure pirate
na_skill.raw_description: Recovers 30% of max HP for 3 turns; reduces bind status (incl. Awoken) by 4 turns
